19 (John 1:18). Satan Sees in Christ a Manifestation of God's Character.--There stood in the world One who was a perfect representative of the Father, One whose character and practices refuted Satan's misrepresentation of God. Satan had charged 
                                                                           1102
upon God the attribute he himself possessed. Now in Christ he saw God revealed in His true character--a compassionate, merciful Father, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to Him in repentance, and have eternal life (ST June 9, 1898).
